description: This file defines a React functional component 'ConnectButton' used for connection management, with props controlling connection state, event handlers, and styling. It handles user interactions for connecting/disconnecting, displaying appropriate button states.

methods.name: ConnectButton
methods.description: React functional component rendering a connect/disconnect button with loading state handling.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Asynchronous event handler for button click, toggling connection state.
